name: part_012
file: tmp_【2022年誕生日企画】白上フブキのすこんなばらえてぃ！【#すこんなばらえてぃ】 [tdaMQAL-6Ww]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_012.mov

scenes.description: Shirakami Fubuki, wearing a YAGOO mask, performs several gags for a panel of judges consisting of Ookami Mio, Houshou Marine, and La+ Darknesss.
YAGOO (Tanigo Motoaki) himself takes the stage to perform a series of 'old man' themed gags, which the judges find hilariously relatable.
Fubuki declares YAGOO the winner of the comedy showdown, and he performs one final gag before the segment ends.

subtitles.original: きたきたきた！
subtitles.english: Here it comes!

subtitles.original: な、なに？
subtitles.english: Wha- what?

subtitles.original: ホロライブのライブを見てる時のYAGOO。
subtitles.english: YAGOO when watching a Hololive live performance.

subtitles.original: うん…　うん…
subtitles.english: Yeah... yeah...

subtitles.original: ちょっと遅い。
subtitles.english: He's a bit slow.

subtitles.original: YAGOOさん動き遅っ。
subtitles.english: YAGOO's movements are so slow.

subtitles.original: え？　待ってYAGOOが滑ったみたいになってんだけど。
subtitles.english: Eh? Wait, it looks like YAGOO failed the gag.

subtitles.original: 笑ってくれた！　笑ってくれた！
subtitles.english: He laughed! He laughed for us!

subtitles.original: なんだ？
subtitles.english: What's this?

subtitles.original: こっちか。これ…　100年後のYouTubeアイコン。
subtitles.english: This way? This is... the YouTube icon 100 years from now.

subtitles.original: 100年後のYouTubeアイコン
subtitles.english: YouTube icon 100 years later

subtitles.original: おい、やめろ！　ガチのやつだ、これ！
subtitles.english: Hey, stop! This is the real deal!

subtitles.original: さっき滑ったやつや、それ！
subtitles.english: That's the gag that failed earlier!

subtitles.original: 誰かがやってたやつやろ、それ！
subtitles.english: That's a gag someone else did, isn't it!

subtitles.original: スタッフ何人もいる中でめちゃめちゃ滑ってたやつや、それ！
subtitles.english: That's the one that failed miserably with all the staff watching!

subtitles.original: そうだ、そうだ！
subtitles.english: That's right, that's right!

subtitles.original: 「僕一歩だけ思いついたわ」とか言って！
subtitles.english: He was like, "I just thought of one step!"

subtitles.original: やめるな！　やめるな！　人の汁を啜ってボケるな！
subtitles.english: Stop it! Stop! Don't profit off someone else's jokes!

subtitles.original: やっちゃった。でも3人笑ってくれましたね！
subtitles.english: I did it. But you three laughed, didn't you!

subtitles.original: 今のは…　今のは笑ってないから。
subtitles.english: Just now... We weren't laughing just now.

subtitles.original: 今のは笑ってないわー！
subtitles.english: We were not laughing at that!

subtitles.original: 笑ってたよ！
subtitles.english: You were totally laughing!

subtitles.original: ズルズルズル！　ズルじゃない！　それはズル！
subtitles.english: Cheat, cheat, cheat! That's not right! That's cheating!

subtitles.original: ズル道はないのか？　ないです、そんな。
subtitles.english: Is there no 'Way of the Cheat'? No, there isn't.

subtitles.original: いや、面白さはやはりね、皆さんに伝えていくべきだと思ってますので。
subtitles.english: Well, I believe funniness should be shared with everyone, after all.

subtitles.original: フブちゃんにはまだ無限のネタがありますからね！
subtitles.english: Fubuki-chan still has an infinite supply of gags!

subtitles.original: 一旦、一旦3つお見せしましたが…　でもね、やっぱYAGOOさんがね…
subtitles.english: I've shown three for now... But, as I thought, YAGOO-san...

subtitles.original: まずどの程度なのかちょっとね、今測りかねてるので。
subtitles.english: ...I'm currently trying to gauge just how good he is.

subtitles.original: 確かにね。
subtitles.english: That's true.

subtitles.original: ま、ま、中笑いぐらいのネタをやらせていただきました。
subtitles.english: I- I- I did some gags that get a medium-sized laugh.

subtitles.original: 中笑い？！　すっごい笑ってたよ！
subtitles.english: Medium-sized laugh?! I was laughing a lot!

subtitles.original: 次はね、あのYAGOOさんにやっていただきますので。
subtitles.english: Next, we'll have YAGOO-san perform for us.

subtitles.original: カモンカモン！
subtitles.english: Come on, come on!

subtitles.original: YAGOOさん準備は大丈夫ですか、YAGOOさん。
subtitles.english: YAGOO-san, are you ready, YAGOO-san?

subtitles.original: もうこの絵面がズルいだろ！
subtitles.english: Just this visual is already cheating!

subtitles.original: さあ行きましょう、皆さんね、表情、表情。
subtitles.english: Now let's go. Everyone, watch his expression.

subtitles.original: これでちょっとズルい…
subtitles.english: This is a bit of a cheat...

subtitles.original: もっと、もっとスッとした表情で。笑わせない、笑わせないつもりで。
subtitles.english: With an even more serious face. Like you're trying not to laugh.

subtitles.original: さあ行きますよ！　ということで、YAGOOさんのチャレンジ！　それでは 3、2、1、スタート！
subtitles.english: Alright, here we go! It's YAGOO-san's challenge! Ready, 3, 2, 1, start!

subtitles.original: 餅つきするおじさん。
subtitles.english: An old man pounding mochi.

subtitles.original: ものじゃねえよ！　ただのおじさんだもんな！
subtitles.english: That's not an impression! He's just an old man!

subtitles.original: ただのおじさんだな！　次次！　みんなまだ大爆笑。
subtitles.english: He's just an old man! Next, next! Everyone's still laughing hard.

subtitles.original: 釣りするおじさん。
subtitles.english: An old man fishing.

subtitles.original: 全部おじさんじゃん！　全部おじさんじゃねえか！
subtitles.english: It's all "old man"! Everything is just "old man", isn't it!

subtitles.original: めっちゃ釣れてる！　やったね！　よかったね！
subtitles.english: He's really catching [laughs]! You did it! Good for you!

subtitles.original: まだまだまだ！　おじさん禁止！　なになにをするおじさん禁止！
subtitles.english: Wait, wait! No more "old man"! "Old man doing something" is forbidden!

subtitles.original: おい、おじさんに縛られたらかなりしんどいっすよ。
subtitles.english: Hey, if I'm restricted from using "old man," it's pretty tough.

subtitles.original: おじさん禁止だ！
subtitles.english: No "old man" allowed!

subtitles.original: 子供を応援するおじさん。
subtitles.english: An old man cheering for children.

subtitles.original: おじさんじゃねえか！　お前ずっとおじさんじゃねえか！
subtitles.english: It's an "old man" again! You've been an "old man" the whole time!

subtitles.original: 頑張れ！　子供、子供！
subtitles.english: Go for it! Children, children!

subtitles.original: ラプちゃん頑張れ！
subtitles.english: Go for it, Lap-chan!

subtitles.original: ファイヤーおじさん！　ハンドおじさん！
subtitles.english: Fire old man! Hand old man!

subtitles.original: こんなもんですかね？
subtitles.english: Is that about right?

subtitles.original: 終了ー！
subtitles.english: Time's up!

subtitles.original: ずっとマリンさんが顔隠して笑ってる。涙が！
subtitles.english: Marine-san has been hiding her face and laughing the whole time. Tears!

subtitles.original: おじさんがツボに入っちゃった！　泣いてんだよ、ちょっと。
subtitles.english: The "old man" really hit my funny bone! I'm crying a little.

subtitles.original: おじさんシリーズズルくないか？！　ズルかった。
subtitles.english: Isn't the "old man" series cheating?! It was totally a cheat.

subtitles.original: ということで、今回のホロライブ一のお笑いマスターは…　YAGOOさんです！
subtitles.english: So, this time's number one comedian in Hololive is... YAGOO-san!

subtitles.original: おい、白上反省しろ！　お前の企画だろ！
subtitles.english: Hey, Shirakami, reflect on yourself! This is your project!

subtitles.original: 優勝して喜ぶおじさんって何だよ！　おじさんシリーズズルすぎるだろ！
subtitles.english: What even is "old man happy about winning"?! This series is too much of a cheat!

subtitles.original: や、みんなが笑ってくれてよかった。久しぶりに。
subtitles.english: Well, I'm glad everyone laughed. It's been a while.

subtitles.original: はやー。ま、ちょっとキングとして最後にもう一つ…
subtitles.english: That was quick. Well, as the King, how about one more for the end...

subtitles.original: もう一つ！　お願いします！　次どんなおじさんが来るのかな！
subtitles.english: One more! Please! I wonder what kind of "old man" is coming next!

subtitles.original: 勝ってない何かで、じゃあおかわりおじさん。
subtitles.english: With something that hasn't won yet, then... the "extra helping" old man.

subtitles.original: おかわり！　いいなー。おかわり行ってみましょう。
subtitles.english: An extra helping! Nice. Let's go for an extra helping.

subtitles.original: じゃあ、用意スタート！
subtitles.english: Alright, ready, start!

subtitles.original: アヒルを育ててるおじさん。
subtitles.english: An old man raising ducks.
